description:
Pfeiffel was an Alliance lieutenant commander and former adjutant to then Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch773 [Alexandre Bewcock] since at least the Third Battle of Tiamat. He collapsed due to a heart attack in January 799 UC caused by overwork as a result of the Imperial annexation of Phezzan and was replaced by http://anidb.net/ch1044 [Soun Soulszzcuaritter].
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Pfeiffel
